description:
MCP Server for utilities from networkcalc.com

Utilities Include
- DNS Lookup
- WHOIS Lookup
- SPF Lookup
- Certificate Lookup
- Subnet Lookup

capabilities.name: dns_lookup
capabilities.description: Fetch DNS info for a given domain

capabilities.name: whois_lookup
capabilities.description: Fetch WHOIS info for a given domain

capabilities.name: spf_lookup
capabilities.description: Fetch SPF info for a given domain or host

capabilities.name: certificate_info
capabilities.description: Fetch certificate for a given domain

capabilities.name: calculate_subnet
capabilities.description: Fetch Subnet info for a given ipaddress/subnet/CIDR
